name: Des(s)ert
description:
Serve desserts in a flora filled desert and become the best pastry chef in the entire Suhgara. Explore the different biomes as a Food Pyramid and collect living berries and fruits to create the best desserts for the inhabitants of the desert.

Game made by Leo Wognum

The game is currently in development and if you have time to spare, please download the game and fill out the survey to help improve the game as well as making production easier and faster!

If you know someone that would like to playtest the game I'd highly appreciate if you sent them this way!

Playtest Survey Link

Controls: 

Movement: WASD, Spacebar to Jump

E to interact with objects, left-click to interact with UI buttons

Press I to open Inventory

Tab to open controls

Escape to open Options Menu
